origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceAPI.derivatives_info', 'description': 'This function provides information about financial derivatives based on the derivative type, underlying asset, maturity, and strike price.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'derivativeType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of financial derivative, e.g., futures, options, swaps.'}, {'name': 'underlyingAsset', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The underlying asset of the derivative, e.g., stock, index, commodity.'}, {'name': 'maturity', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The maturity of the derivative contract.'}, {'name': 'strikePrice', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The strike price for options contracts.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'details', 'description': 'The details of the financial derivative including classification, trading rules, risk control methods, and recommendations for beginners.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinanceAPI.derivatives_info, 它的参数输入如下: 'derivativeType'是'options', 'underlyingAsset'是'stock', 'maturity'是'1 year', 'strikePrice'是'100'.
